name: InspeXion
description:
Bitter Game Jam

Hosted by Ken · #bittergamejam

Theme: “The food inspector is here”

Limitation: “It just takes 5 seconds”

Here's "InspeXion", a game about a Food Inspector 🕵️ who's been called to inspect 🔍 restaurants and judge whether the food 🍔 they're serving is up to code or not! Utilize the game's intuitive drag and drop system, categorizing good, scrumptious food 😋 from bad, moldy food 🤢. Can you fulfill your duties as Food Inspector?

All art, music and SFX made by BurterButterBeans Studio 2021
